cause.description:
My girlfriend and sister are training to participate in an endurance event as a member of The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society's Team In Training, by completing a 21.1KM half marathon.
Please make a donation to support her participation in Team In Training and help advance the Society's mission.
Thanks for your support!
Check out her website to make a donation www.active.com/donate/tntvan/tntvanNTamayo1
1. Please sponsor Norma and she trains for her marathon while fundraising for cancer research
cause.name: Team in Training fundraising for cancer
